items.description: This schedule is applicable to Delivery Service for residential purposes of a permanent nature to individual private dwellings and to individually metered apartments when such Delivery Service is to one Point of Delivery and measured through one Meter and is not for shared or resale purposes.
items.energycomments:
Fixed monthly charge is the customer charge $1.62 plus the metering charge $3.85 plus Rider AMS $3.05.
Energy charge is LSP customer charge $ 0.06 plus Minimum LSP energy charge $ 0.049 plus Transmission System Charge $0.008439 plus Distribution System Charge $0.016489 plus TC2 charge $0.00303 plus TC3 $0.000406 plus SRC $0.001082 plus TC5 $0.003211 plus NDC $0.00001 plus TCRF $0.00672 plus EECRF $0.000862 plus ADFITC $-0.000355
items.name: Residential LSP POLR
